description: Detects a windows service to be stopped
author: Jakob Weinzettl
oscd.community
Nasreddine Bencherchali
false_positives: Administrator shutting down the service due to upgrade or removal purposes
name: Stop Windows Service
query: ((((((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("sc.exe" OR "net.exe" OR "net1.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:(*\\sc.exe OR *\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe))) AND process.command_line.text:*\ stop\ *) AND (NOT (process.command_line.text:("sc  stop KSCWebConsoleMessageQueue" OR "sc  stop LGHUBUpdaterService") AND user.name:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*))))) OR ((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line.text:*Stop\-Service\ *)))
